name: Ivan
description: I’m passionate and young at heart which helps with a sense of humor.I’m casual, easy going, sarcastic and chivalrous!I strive to be a gentleman and take pride in treating my woman with dignity and respect.The desire of my heart is that I meet and grow to love the woman with whom I hope to spend the rest of my life I look to try to stay on an even like with someone I just meet and remain focused and positive while being a good listener. I am a very open minded, down-to-earth, laid back, eclectic and modest man who has lots of love to give. Although I haven’t had successful relationships in the past. I know what I am looking for in a permanent commitment. I’m not looking for someone I can live with but looking for someone I can’t live without. People focus so much on the physical or financial attributes of a person, that the fail to think about their lives with that person. Several years down the road for me, it is all about how the person makes me feel inside. Looks fade, money is spent(you never know when either of those things will be exhausted), but who you are on the inside never dies.
